# Reference

## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`hashicorp_repo`](#hashicorp_repo): A class to add the official HashiCorp package repository

## Classes

### <a name="hashicorp_repo"></a>`hashicorp_repo`

This class adds the official HashiCorp package repository to a supported
system. It fails when running on an unsupported distribution.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include hashicorp_repo
```
